website_summaries.verdict: A simple and durable set of four stacking pails that include molds on the bottom.
pros: The molded sea animals help with counting
Great for digging, carrying water, and building castles
Can hold up for hours of play in the heavy sand
cons: The largest is only about seven inches tall
Only one of the buckets has a handle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Gosh I searched and searched for good beach toys for my 6 year old and 2 year old. I have purchased so many toys in the past and buckets were always first to fall apart or just always felt cheap. These are excellent quality. It's the perfect size too for the kids to fill with water or sand and carry independently. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: worth paying a little more for these
customer_reviews.text: These have held up well to heavy use by twin 4-year olds in sand and snow. We've gone through a bunch cheap pails from the dollar store - these Melissa & Doug ones are definitely worth the price. The sizes are perfect, and the fact that only one has a handle works out well, not only for the kids' play, but also for packing and transport.
customer_reviews.author: Mollyreader

customer_reviews.title: The absolute MUST-HAVE, BEST toddler cup set.  Hours of play.  Sturdy, bright and they love love love it!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the toys I bought my young neices THIS was the winner! They ignored all their other toys - and played wth these cups. These will last for years. A fantastic buy. I had to buy one for my grandbaby and send it up to Portland - even though the shippping was more than the product!
customer_reviews.author: JoJoWestSide

customer_reviews.title: very useful and fun
customer_reviews.text: First be aware they are not as big as you might think. Check the measurements and try to visualize it comparing it to things already in your home. However, if you are traveling to the beach, it is lovely not to take up too much space. So this may be a bonus. There are 4 small buckets, so lots to share. Very sturdy. My grandkids loved them.
customer_reviews.author: NF

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!! Quality is very good and I'm so glad one of the buckets have turtles in it because it's my daughter's favorite animal (she gets so excited when she sees a turtle anywhere). Also, the molds at the bottoms will be a surprise for our 20 month daughter when we use it at the beach on our trip in October.
customer_reviews.author: Jade A.

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time purchasimg
customer_reviews.text: Unknowingly purchased this set for a second time in two years for use at beach house. The new set looks almost the same as the first set (after sitting g out in the Bahamian sun for a year). The only thing missing was the handle from one of the year old pails
customer_reviews.author: Benzimidazolone

customer_reviews.title: Great sandcastle buckets
customer_reviews.text: These buckets are great for sand castles because they are sturdy and thick, and not too big. It's convenient that they nest so they don't take up too much room, and because they're numbered it makes it easier to make sure you haven't left one behind.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good but could improve!!
customer_reviews.text: These buckets are good and sturdy but they would be sooooooo much better if they had a few holes in at least one or two of the buckets to allow the air to circulate and the sand to drop also so they could be duly used for sand and water sprinkling.
customer_reviews.author: WifeyMommaGrammy

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as an addition to the excellent B.Toys sand set. Very sturdy and good colors. love the sea creatures on the bottom... they look great when used as a sand mold.
customer_reviews.author: TobycW

customer_reviews.title: GENIUS!!  Must have beach buckets!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best beach buckets ever. My 3yr old and 1yr old LOVE them. Way better quality than any other plastic sand bucket I've ever seen and they stack for carrying to beach. Genius!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia mcintyre

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach or bath!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last minute when I realized we’d lost our beach toys during a move. My son loved filling the buckets with water and using it for baptizing us in the pool. He also loves using them in the bath for his water cogs.
customer_reviews.author: bitiloli

customer_reviews.title: Buckets
customer_reviews.text: I mean kids sand buckets. Fill with sand dump repeat. Good quality sturdy kids buckets.
customer_reviews.author: kyle hotchkin

customer_reviews.title: ... tools you need on the beach to build a great sand castle
customer_reviews.text: These have all the tools you need on the beach to build a great sand castle. I especially liked them because they all fit together for storage but act as a full set of beach tools. Smart design!
customer_reviews.author: RyanBest

customer_reviews.title: These were the only toys my son used on our recent beach vacation
customer_reviews.text: My 16 month old LOVED these buckets. First of all, he likes stacking and nesting toys, and these were a perfect size for him. Also having the cute sea creatures on the bottom was fun for us, as we are just learning to count things. He would look at them on the pail, and it was remarkable how well the forms came out when we made castles. We also got a bucket with a rake and shovel, but they didn't get used at all - he just wanted these nesting pails. Well done Melissa & Doug.
customer_reviews.author: Darby

customer_reviews.title: Great little beach buckets!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these, along with Joyin Toy Sand Beach Toys Set for our family beach trip for our four year-old and two year-old. They loved it!! Our boys are obsessed with buckets and played with these for hours on the beach and in the pool. Good quality and love that they nest, easy for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R

customer_reviews.title: Durable and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Every Mellissa & Doug toy I've purchased, or had handed down, has been of Very High Quality. Glad to know that we will get many years of use of them. They are the kinds of toys you put away and save and reuse next season. LOVE THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Odman

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! Definitely worth the money spent and I can see these lasting a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Darlisha Williams

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these!!! Great durable, thick, plastic nesting buckets. Beautiful numbers and letters, bright, clear and easy to read!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K.

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sand for years to come
customer_reviews.text: Was comparing different sand buckets online and didn't know if these were worth the extra money. Ended up spending the next day with our friends at the beach and they had these exact buckets. They are made so much more durable than the other buckets I was looking at. The plastic is very thick and I expect these to not crack as easy. When we got home I ordered a bunch of Melissa and Doug beach products. Definitely worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, versatile pails
customer_reviews.text: Love these pails. Melissa and Doug sand toys are the best. Colorful and great solid quality. Would buy as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: goldenugget

customer_reviews.title: Beach Necessity
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for a family vacation we are currently taking on the SC coast. Our entire family came which includes 9 grandkids ages 8 and under. When not in the ocean, these get constant use building sand castles and moving sand. A big hit with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: VJ Sansom

customer_reviews.title: I have yet to be disappointed in a Melissa and Doug toy
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to be disappointed in a Melissa and Doug toy. This nesting/stackable pail set is adorable and helps expose children to numbers, introducing the concept of small to large as the smallest is "1" and it goes up from there. Lots of fun, sturdy and educational. A steal!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: For kids 3+
customer_reviews.text: These Amazon page for these says the manufacturer's recommendation is 24 months and up. But the buckets themselves come with a tag that says 3 years and older. I wouldn't have bought them if I'd had that accurate information.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Liberman

customer_reviews.title: We love Melissa and Doug!
customer_reviews.text: These buckets are so cute! Kids love the different sea creatures! Very colorful and sturdy. The only thing I realized after purchase was the buckets didn’t have handles! Boo. Other than that, amazing : ) I would definitely recommend, even without the handles.
customer_reviews.author: scott m.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. The cutest buckets and the best quality! I can’t believe they were so cheap. My boys love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best beach buckets ever
customer_reviews.text: Best beach buckets ever. Make sure you write your name inside them as they are very popular and I had to rescue them from other parents several times who thought they were theirs. worth the extra money as they last years.
customer_reviews.author: H Passos

customer_reviews.title: Love that these stack!  Helps cut down on all the stuff that is carried to the beach.  Kids love playing with them.
customer_reviews.text: Love that these stack! Helps cut down on all the stuff that is carried to the beach. Kids love playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: E. Boucher

customer_reviews.title: These worked great at the beach for digging and for quick fencing ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked great at the beach for digging and for quick fencing of the sand castle. Definitely a keeper. Ordered with the Melissa and Doug Sunny Patch Sand Brick-Building Set with Mold and Trowel.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Stiffler

customer_reviews.title: Worthy
customer_reviews.text: I got this when my boy was 8 months. He could put the small into the bigger one very easily, and he loved to do it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Julissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect vacation toy
customer_reviews.text: These kept my nephews attention at the beach and pool for hours. As a cute added bonus they did Birthday pictures on the beach and used the cute 2 bucket. They fit nicely in a suitcase and were not broken on the flight there or back.
customer_reviews.author: TheRichards

customer_reviews.title: quality set!
customer_reviews.text: As with most Melissa and Doug products, this set is very durable and made with quality materials...unlike most beach sets you'll find. I purchased the cookie, cupcake, and ice cream sets as well as the nesting pails. All are great. They provided hours of fun and I am sure will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Runner

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fun buckets
customer_reviews.text: We are on our second set of these. They are excellent quality and size. My kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: XxxzShawnee

customer_reviews.title: Beach Fun
customer_reviews.text: This was part of Melissa and Dougs beach toys, gave to gand daughter for Easter (put all items below in basket for her ) she absolutely enjoys all of them and places each piece on the floor and plays with it , Can't wait to get to beach so she can make the molds
customer_reviews.author: mary ricci

customer_reviews.title: The best beach toys ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these buckets along with another beach toy set that came with shovels, rakes, airplanes, etc. My two boys loved these buckets more than anything else. These are practically all they played with the three days we were at the beach. And I love how incredibly durable they are. I highly recommend these buckets!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy. I put them in my backpack along ...
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy. I put them in my backpack along with the Sunnyside starfish shovels by mellisa and Doug.roll them on sand for a smooth pattern like turtles .a pattern is on all peices on each side as well as on the bottom to make sand castles. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Great Buckets!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a 2 yr old birthday. They were sorted, stacked, separated, filled and hauled around in January on a living room floor with no sand! I can only imagine the possibilities once they take them outside! Great design and sturdy compared to most beach/sand toys on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Best Buckets
customer_reviews.text: The best sand buckets! 4 sizes that can be stacked and easily carried away. They are not cheaply made. Plus it's always good to have extras for sharing.
customer_reviews.author: Msollenb

customer_reviews.title: These worked well, overall
customer_reviews.text: Nesting like they do and being sturdier than your average pail is good. The handle on the biggest one has a tendency to pop off, which is a little lame, considering that these are pretty pricy. But they worked well for sand, water, and collecting shells.
customer_reviews.author: JujubeMBA

customer_reviews.title: These buckets have so many functions for my 1 year ...
customer_reviews.text: These buckets have so many functions for my 1 year old. He loves to use it as a nesting set, put things in them and of course throw them!
customer_reviews.author: Elin

customer_reviews.title: The color comes off easily
customer_reviews.text: The color on the numbers comes off very easily. We've only used them for occasional water play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A sand essential
customer_reviews.text: Our kids loved playing with these on the beach. A great addition to our bag of sand toys.
customer_reviews.author: Holland

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: There isn't all that much to these buckets, but my daughter has a blast playing with them at the beach. It's great too that you don't have to lug around 4 buckets, since they nest. Definitely a great investment; I can tell they will last quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: BeachMom

customer_reviews.title: Hours of beach fu
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. What toddler doesn't love filling up a bucket and then pouring that into another bucket? Sturdy, not the flimsy buckets from the discount stores. I expect these to last a while.
customer_reviews.author: artsonggirl

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, well-made toy
customer_reviews.text: My 20-month-old nephew loves his stacking cups so I bought these on impluse for Christmas when I bought a CGear Sand-free Multirug for his mother. It was his favorite toy on Christmas morning and we took it out onto the beach that afternoon to try it out in the sand. The pails are very easy to mold with, and I really like the way they nest into each other so compactly. Four pails in less space than the two we were using before, and they are small enough for him to carry by himself! The plastic seems very sturdy - I expect we will be using these for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Braidweaver

customer_reviews.title: what fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 1 yr old granddaughter to use at the beach, but she has just as much fun putting things in & taking them back out. They are VERY colorful & fun to use. My only complaint is they should all have handles. Otherwise, a good gift for the price!
customer_reviews.author: kathy helms

customer_reviews.title: Quality buckets
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy little buckets!!! Our two little boys, ages 3 and 6, used these every day at the beach for 6 days. They withstood a pounding and are still in perfect shape. We definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Cute.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our beach vacation and loved how durable they were. Also love the shapes on the bottom, which made our sandcastles even more special. Our almost 2 year old loves filling them, dumping them and stacking them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Not at all worried about it breaking. Grandson who is four was immediately interested and excited. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pails, especially since they're nesting and easy to pack. They are also sturdy. My kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Driftwood52

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love these for building sand castles. Durable and are a manageable size for hauling water from the surf. Love that they stack making them easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Mindel

customer_reviews.title: Good toys
customer_reviews.text: Great to keep the kiddo busy at the beach. He's really into learning his numbers now. So it's a bonus that the numbers are on the sides of the buckets.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, sand toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for older kids and they loved them (8 and 5) for the beach. Other kids want to use them!
customer_reviews.author: V. Girard

customer_reviews.title: Nesting Pails
customer_reviews.text: I like these pails for the kids due to the fact that they fit into each other and have numbers on them to teach the kids. Also like the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Nesting Buckets Are Great
customer_reviews.text: The fact that these buckets fit inside one another makes beach clean up and packing so much easier on us. And the stacking / nesting is fun for our 2 year old daughter. The buckets were durable and stood up to a lot of sand, water, and carrying around the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh and Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy buckets, will last a long time playing in the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Dayon Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: These work great in the sand and you can really see the designs on top. Nice to have nesting buckets and even a bucket with a handle. Kids enjoyed them. Ages 6, 4, 3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Agree with others
customer_reviews.text: These were great to pack for the beach since they stack. My kids had fun using them in the sand and didn't seem to mind that only one had a handle. Overall, it was a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: N. H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality! Very sturdy and functional. Stop reading and just buy them! :)
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Really nice buckets that will last for years
customer_reviews.text: Really well constructed and educational! The little one loves these buckets. The float too so they were fun in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, very durable
customer_reviews.text: These buckets are great-- very sturdy plastic, they will last for years I think, compared with some other cheap buckets I bought before finding these... wish I found these sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Jen C.

customer_reviews.title: Cute bucket set
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for the beach or sandbox. The only slight drawback is that the one, two, and three buckets do not have handles - only the largest one has a handle. The size 3 bucket is too heavy when filled with sand for my little one to flip - if it had a handle it might be easier. I like the set as is but it would've been 5 stars had all the buckets had handles. Colors are vibrant and I love that each one has a little critter at the bottom (i.e. starfish, octopus, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: great beach toys
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a beach trip for my 6, 9, 11 y/o children. They made lots of cities with the buckets and collected lots of shells in the buckets. Exactly what I was looking for - highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Long Tall Texan

customer_reviews.title: My one and a half year old really enjoyed playing with this
customer_reviews.text: My one and a half year old really enjoyed playing with this.
customer_reviews.author: Luciana

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: The best. Wish I had gotten them a long time ago. Its nice that you can take many bucket to the beach/park and they don't take much room. Thick and solid.
customer_reviews.author: P. Aip

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Great beach gear for 1 year old! Well made! Know it will be one of our beach favorites for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: JessT

customer_reviews.title: Survived a weekend of intense sand castle building
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for a weekend at the beach so that we could build sand castles. We spent nearly the entire weekend on sand castles and these held up wonderfully. They are strong and durable and they met all my needs and expectations for the task I needed them for. I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J. Fassler

customer_reviews.title: A hit!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, smooth soft plastic. My son absolutely loves them and we haven't even taken them outside yet! Just wait until we get them in the sandbox!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marie

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable pails
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my then 13month old to take along for our beach vacation. These pails are colorful, and made out of durable, thick plastic unlike the other beach sets that are made out of cheap, flimsy, plastic. The nesting, stack-able set also provides for some education while having fun at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sun
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Colorful. Fun! Just as described! Stacks together for traveling to the beach! Very pleased with this purchase! Melissa and Doug toys are the best!
customer_reviews.author: J. Solitro

customer_reviews.title: He has so much fun stacking and unstacking them and filling them with water ...
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old LOVES this set. He has so much fun stacking and unstacking them and filling them with water at the beach. Sturdy and very well made! Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Horan

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These will last three years, weather, and the abuse of the lil people.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy H

customer_reviews.title: Love it stacks so just to carry one bucket instead ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and cute design. Love it stacks so just to carry one bucket instead of four and space saving too.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My son is 9 months old and we bought these for his first beach trip. I was at a loss about what toys a 9 month old might enjoy and actually use at the beach and bought these last minute. They were great! Fun for everyone and he loved them! I am already excited to take them back to the back with us in a few weeks!
customer_reviews.author: hsiburt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: for my grandchildren in their sand box for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great for use outside or inside, lots to be learned for a toddler in playing with these!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty buckets - 4 stars because I wish they all had the handles.
customer_reviews.author: GMGAR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Who can't use a lot of buckets at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Hemena

customer_reviews.title: These are nice and sturdy and I love that they all fit ...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and sturdy and I love that they all fit together. We've had one set for over 2 years and it hasn't cracked or broken!
customer_reviews.author: MEmm

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic toy--delights the little ones. . .
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. My 18 m-o grandson absolutely took it over and couldn't stop playing with it for over 1/2 hour. The number, shapes, and colors make it a multipurpose learning toy in addition to the "beach" use. He loved stacking it over and over and over! His 4 yo brother actually stood on it (OMG) in the hardwood floor and it didn't seem to hurt them, but I don't think that should be done regularly. I don't know the status after their beach trip but if there is anything to report, I'll edit. Buy this set!
customer_reviews.author: J-Z

customer_reviews.title: Quality fun at the beach
customer_reviews.text: We have been enjoying this bucket set all summer. It is high quality and has held up to a lot of abuse. The different sizes are great and the carry bag is really sturdy. We have been thrilled and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Liss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great sturdy buckets for sand. cute designs on bottoms make it fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jaron Speakman

customer_reviews.title: These pails are great. Good material
customer_reviews.text: These pails are great. Good material, well made, stack nicely together. Perfect for the beach. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Durable, colorful
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy, durable, and colorful. I'll be curious to see how the color holds up after a summer in the sun. Time will tell. Overall, great product!
customer_reviews.author: OVMom

customer_reviews.title: SWyatt
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat M&D products. Love how they stack together. Perfect size for little ones. Can't wait to see him play on the beach with them.
customer_reviews.author: Swyatt

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: These were bought as a gift for my 6 year old grand daughter. They shipped quickly and she loves playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: great beach toy
customer_reviews.text: Both children ages 2 & 4 love these pails. They also play with them at home indoors. Compact and easy to transport, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Love these pails!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sizes, stack so that they don't take up a lot of space. Durable, kid friendly, and fun. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nim

customer_reviews.title: Fun buckets for the beach.
customer_reviews.text: Cute buckets!!! My son enjoys playing with them on the beach. The plastic is thick and sturdy. I bought the Melissa and Doug seahorse shovel to go along with the buckets.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: there are cheaper pails but these nest together so nicely so are easy to bring to beach or sandbox. Lots of play value.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The buckets are the best!! All you need for the beach- although our bucket did not have a handle.
customer_reviews.author: alison

customer_reviews.title: money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love the designs on top of the buckets. Very well made would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Burger

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoyed these buckets. My two-year-old didn't so much build castles as she did pour water from one bucket to the other.
customer_reviews.author: Rs

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy, good looking, practical
customer_reviews.text: Basically nothing to complain about, so giving a 5 star. My boys approved them to play in the sand. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad thing to say. Super impressed with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Koch

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach and beyond.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sand buckets for a recent beach vacation. They didn't take up too much room in the suitcase. Sturdy plastic, nest nicely, stack on top of each other. Our daughter (1 1/2 yo) played with them for a long time in the sand, pool and bath. The numbers and animals are nice added features. Now that we are home, she plays with them around the house for sorting and toting toys. I also plan to take them outside to play in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great for all kids, all ages.
customer_reviews.text: These nesting pails are fun for all age groups. Love the bright colors, easy to store and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: maria b.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT for the beach! Good quality for price.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality beach toys! Love the designs and my kids loved them to.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Vandergaag

customer_reviews.title: Great attention to detail on these
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to use these w/ my son. Great attention to detail on these. LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Mase's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Vivid colors and numbering and STURDY! Will hold up well for my three grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: Vivid colors and numbering and STURDY! Will hold up well for my three grandchildren. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LAB15

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Seaside Sidekicks Nesting Pails
product_meta.description:
Style:Nesting PailsCount, mold and nest . . . three great activities with four pails! Count the critters molded on the bottom of each pail. Fill each pail with sand and decorate the beach with starfish, turtles, crabs and octopi! When playtime is over, nest all the pails and carry them home with the sturdy sea-green handle. For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully-designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.” We design every toy to the highest-quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we'll make it right. Our phone number is on every product!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!
feature_bullets: Four nesting pails with molded details for counting and sand-building fun
Built-in decorative molds include a starfish, turtle, crab and octopus.
Perfect for a day at the beach!
